original_text: Even when we were dead in sins, hath quickened us together with Christ, (by grace ye are saved;)
korean_text: 허물로 죽은 우리를 그리스도와 함께 살리셨고 (너희는 은혜로 구원을 받은 것이라)

sentences.original_text: Even when we were dead in sins,
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 죄 가운데 죽어 있을 때에도,

sentences.original_text: hath quickened us together with Christ,
